# Test: grove remove --force --branch deletes unmerged branch
setup_workspace unmerged-force

exec grove add unmerged-force
cd ../unmerged-force
exec sh -c 'echo "unmerged work" > work.txt'
exec git add work.txt
exec git commit -m 'unmerged commit'
cd ../main

exec grove remove --force --branch unmerged-force
stderr 'Removed worktree.*unmerged-force'
stderr 'deleted branch'
! exists ../unmerged-force
assert_branch deleted unmerged-force
